title: Trans Voice Workshop [upcoming]
description: A reboot of our previously cancelled workshop on trans voice. Currently, we are envisioning a 2-part series. The first short workshop would be ‘trans 101 for the voice studio’, and the second workshop would address specific questions from our members arising from the first workshop.

title: Student Presentations [upcoming]
description: A series of student presentations to highlight voice research. This will provide a great opportunity for student researchers to get a NATS presentation under their belts. We are thinking of holding a couple of these in the evening, perhaps from 7-8pm. Bring your favourite cocktail, sit back, and listen!

title: Wine & Wimpers [upcoming]
description: We want to provide a space for voice professionals to come together and chat – informally.
